Articles.Content:
Hey everyone, just wanted to introduce myself, my name is Jacob, I'm from NY and I am a hobbyist game designer and programmer. Just jumped on board with ksp about a week ago and already started working on my first mod. (I'll release more details in the near future)

I hope to get to know some of the other members of the community as well as the development team and get to collaborate on some project with some of you other modders out there.
Hi there Jacob and welcome to the forums. There is an excellent modding community here, both on the forums and on #kspmodders on espernet IRC. Pay them a visit!
Hello there and welcome to the forums
